name: Corpus Edax
description:
Corpus Edax is a short, first-person lite immersive-sim RPG, made for the HPS1 Summer of Shivers jam. The "lite" part refers to how it has some mechanics from an immersive-sim, made by 1 person in 1 month, so keep your expectations in check! Setting

Without the Dark Ages, the Industrial Age quickly came to prominence in the late 16th century, and with it, a rapidly decaying atmosphere.

After a series of catastrophic weather events, humanity is forced to abandon Earth in search of a new planet.

Set in a retro-future of late 70s and early 2000s , on a city in a distant planet, you are suddenly upgraded from a GRADE-C citizen to a GRADE-B citizen, giving you the privilege of having a job and a new apartment.

You start at the beginning of your first day, but things rarely go according to plan...

Features
  • A character creation sheet so you can play and make a character how you want
  • Melee-based combat
  • Stealth
  • Branching dialogue with skill-checks and consequences
  • Grab, throw, kick objects into people
  • Explore a small part of station that holds a couple of secret areas
  • Access computers and look for datapads to learn more about the world
There are still some missing features due to lack of time - some skills (Hacking, Stealth, Barter, Lockpicking) haven't been fully implemented yet, some sounds are missing.

WELCOME TO

Mac Users - To open the game please do the following

  1. Open Terminal
  2. Right-click on the game's app and click Show Package Contents
  3. Go to Contents/MacOS and you'll see the game's executable
  4. Type "chmod -x" in Terminal and drap the game executable onto the Terminal window so it completes the path.
  5. Hit Enter
